name: The Oneira #001
description:
Hidden in the metaverse, The Oneiras live on the boundless Tezos blockchain. Her existence is like an endless dream that every Oneira carries in front of her third eye, visible to the human world. As personified dreams, the task of the mysterious Oneiras is to lead people into the land of dreams. They do well with sleeping people - but even daydreamers are not safe from The Oneiras' temptation! They manage to take imaginative people into the metaverse of dreams with their special skills. What are you dreaming of?

The term Oneira is a female modification of "Oneiros", which comes from Greek mythology and represents the embodiment of dreams.
